channel.title: Completionist Cape Requirements HELP
channel.description:
Source: TrisidiaX
i need help with making the completionist cape available when you have 21 skills 99 but at the moment, you need all the 99's including the PK skill and the Dungeoneering skill
i have no clue where to look to fix this problem, and thats why im asking for your help.
any help would be much appreciated

for (int i = 0; i < 21; i++) {
 //code
